name: NorthPoleLiveRadio
0:
”Alexa, open north pole live radio”
”Alexa, play north pole live radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: north pole live radio
des:
North Pole Live is the most eclectic and diverse holiday station you'll ever hear!

Broadcasting from a swanky little shack just steps from Santa's workshop, we bring you funky holiday goodness--blues, jazz, R&B, indie rock, americana, and more, all to create the perfect soundtrack for your holidays!

Looking for those same 10 songs the Christmas stations play over and over? You won't find them here!

Happy Holidays from North Pole Live!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
